name: THESINS//008 : LETTER OF APOLOGY
description:
May gave the letter to Tom at Lia's house, she didn't want to see him alone. There is nothing good about goodbye, so I will not say goodbye, but take care and be happy, even if that happiness no longer includes me. Tom read the last sentence of May's letter. “how can i be happy, if the only source of it is gone?”
May was silent, she knew this was the best for all. The nightmare about Carl killing Tom kept coming back and  May doesn’t want that to happen.
“Okay.” suddenly Tom spoke. Then let's have our final farewell party.
